metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: 9. Prepare the Agreement and Add Fields:
Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
2. Choose from the options, or provide details in the text box. Then select Submit

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Interactive forms: These contain fields that you can select and fill in form fields like text fields, comb fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons manually add text and other symbols anywhere on the form using the Fill & Sign tool if You can complete the forms by entering information and adding your signatures also allows you to send your completed forms to others and securely save them in Adobe

You can now add any necessary fields to the agreement a Signature field must be placed for each signer (including internal counter-singers) Simple Authoring is loaded by default in most instances Text input (All Text fields are flagged as Required) Signature date (Read-Only; Supplied by the system)

You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the Prepare Form tool or Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill & Sign tool To create an interactive form, use the Prepare Forms tool To enable the Fill & Sign tools, from the hamburger menu (File menu in macOS) choose Save As Other  > Acrobat Reader Extended PDF > Enable More Tools (includes

Sometimes form creators don’t convert their PDFs to Or, they intentionally design a form that you can fill in only by hand An interactive form contains fields that you can select or fill in If necessary, select either the Hand Tool or the Select Tool from the context menu of the page (right-click on the page to open the context menu)
Choose from the options, or provide details in the text box
